hoteldetail.description: General Information: The Holiday Inn Heathrow M4 J4 is a contemporary upscale hotel with an exciting range of food & beverage outlets and a choice of standard and Executive bedrooms.The Holiday Inn Heathrow M4 J4 Hotel is ideal for families or the business traveler. Location: Holiday Inn Heathrow is an ideal choice due to its location, just off J4 of the M4 a few minutes from Heathrow Airport and within easy reach of London and locally Windsor Legoland and Twickenham Rugby ground. Area: The Holiday Inn Heathrow M4 J4 Hotel is ideal for families just a few miles from Legoland Windsor & Windsor Castle & within easy driving distance to Thorpe Park, Chessington World of Adventures & Twickenham Rugby Ground. To keep the children entertained we offer a kids playroom.There are 3 Holiday Inn Hotels in the Heathrow area, to avoid confusion please quote the full hotel name to taxi/shuttle driver Recreation: Having recently undergone an extensive upgrade and refurbishment, the hotel now boasts the following facilities. Rotisserie Restaurant serves the Great British Breakfast. Deli lunch and Rotisserie menu in the evenings.Sampans Oriental restaurant - genuine Thai/Chinese/Malaysian cuisine cooked by authentic chefs.Callaghans Irish Bar - live it up in and authentic and atmospheric setting with ice cold Guinness on draught and tasty bar menu.The Lobby Lounge - a contemporary setting to enjoy drinks & snacks. The Academy Conference and Training Centre, a purpose built and self-contained professional meeting/training venue with dedicated staff on hand to support and ensure that events become a success.Spirit Workout - fresh and motivating gym experience. Rooms: All guest rooms at the Holiday Inn Heathrow M4 J4 feature Colour TV with Sky and Teletext, Radio, Telephone, Hairdryer, Tea/coffee making facilities,Air conditioning.
hoteldetail.roomfacility: #Air Condition#Alarm Clock#Cable/Satellite TV#Coffee/Tea Making Facilities#Hairdryer#High Speed Internet Access#Private Bath#Telephone

hoteldetail.description: General Information: The Crowne Plaza London Heathrow has an impressive reputation for outstanding individual service, making it an excellent choice for the business and leisure guest. Come see why we�ve earned such a reputation. Location: Crowne Plaza London Heathrow Hotel is situated just off Junction 4 of the M4 1 mile from M25. Area: Crowne Plaza London Heathrow Hotel is situated just off Junction 4 of the M4 1 mile from M25 and easy access to Central London, Legoland, Windsor and Heathrow Airport terminals 1,2,3 and 4 (Shuttle bus available). Crowne Plaza London Heathrow Hotel enjoys close proximity to Stockley Business Park situated within 2 minutes drive from the hotel. Recreation: The hotel offers a wide range of conference and meeting facilities that can accommodate up to 200 people. Spirit Health and Fitness centre at the Crowne Plaza London Heathrow offers relaxing leisure facilities including Indoor swimming pool, Sauna, Whirlpool. The hotel boasts its own 9 hole golf course. Crowne Plaza London Heathrow Hotel offers a choice of restaurants Simply Nico�s and Concha Grill and bar, Dr� O�Driscolls Irish Pub and 24 hrs room service. Rooms: Crowne Plaza London Heathrow Hotel offers modern refurbished rooms and is equipped with High Speed Internet Access in all rooms,mini bar, coffe/tea making facilities, cable/satellite TV, telephone with voicemail, private bathroom, work desk with lamp, and iron with ironing board.
